name: Koop
intro: Helps creators and communities launch NFT-based membership passes to raise funds
introduce: Koop enables any creator, collector, or community to organize and fundraise through NFT art or collector passes. Funds from collector passes form each community’s treasury (or bank) to back their projects and missions on chain. Communities can then directly manage their treasury, leverage the unique skills of their members, and govern their organization in a fun and social way.
